DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine best dose strategy use Excimer Laser treat plaque-type psoriasis . In study , half body 's psoriasis treat new dose strategy , half treat conventional method . We hope show new dose strategy result faster improvement psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: Excimer Laser Phototherapy Outcomes Treatment Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , assessor-blinded clinical trial determine whether novel plaque-based dosimetry strategy improve speed response excimer laser treatment patient plaque psoriasis . Each patient receive plaque-based dose one side body conventional dosing contralateral side . This design base assumption psoriasis usually affect patient symmetric distribution ( e.g. , knee elbow ) effect excimer laser phototherapy limit treated plaque . The side body treat plaque-based dosimetry assign use table random number . The assessor blind treatment group . Each patient treat 1-2 time per week discretion investigator maximum 10 treatment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosis chronic plaque psoriasis least 6 month 2 . Age ≥ 18 year 3 . Body surface area affect ≤ 10 percent 4 . Presence least one pair bilateral target lesion area least 20 cm2 per target lesion . The bilateral target lesion must present category anatomical region ( e.g. , bilateral low extremity , bilateral upper extremity bilateral trunk ) . 1. active past history erythrodermic psoriasis , guttate psoriasis , pustular psoriasis 2. history photosensitivity disorder 3. history malignant melanoma 4. active , invasive nonmelanoma skin carcinoma 5 . Fitzpatrick Skin Type I 6 . Subject receive ultraviolet B phototherapy topical antipsoriatic therapy within two week prior start study . 7 . Subject receive systemic topical psoralenultraviolet A photochemotherapy within four week prior start study . 8 . Subject receive biologic therapy within three month start study .
